name: Made You Look
description:
Standoff against a caricature of some of history's most famous and/or infamous public figures and try to guess which way they going to look by swiping Up, Down, Left or Right. Guess correctly and you will drain your opponent's energy; guess incorrectly and you will lose energy. Complete Ridiculousness!

Game Features:
-Simple Controls
-Light-hearted
-Watch the caricatures' funny reactions to winning and losing
